toggleSneakDisableWhileFlying.name: Disable While Flying
toggleSneakDisableWhileFlying.description: If enabled, toggle sneak will be disabled while the player is flying.

flyBoostOnlyWhileSprinting.name: Only While Sprinting
flyBoostOnlyWhileSprinting.description: If enabled, the fly boost will only be applied while the player is sprinting.

overwriteSpectatorFlyBoost.name: Overwrite Spectator Fly Boost
overwriteSpectatorFlyBoost.description: If enabled, the addon will overwrite the spectator fly boost that can be changed by scrolling with the mouse wheel.

flyboost.denied: The setting "Fly Boost" has been force disabled by the server.
